title: Die In One Day
overview: Richard is desperate: he must try to get back his daughter taken away from him by his ex-wife who reduced him to poverty. When he meets Sasha, an aspiring actress, he believes he has found a way out. The girl, in fact, convinces him to participate in a 24-hour theater game with a rich cash prize. Richard, however, does not know that he is about to take part in a bloody show...
